    createHoliday(LocalDate holidayDate)
    Create a new holiday and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new holiday object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write holiday object to a new file and save

  • Method Details

    • createHoliday

      public void createHoliday(LocalDate holidayDate)
      Create a new holiday and add it into the database file after validating the attributes If attributes are invalid, do nothing If database file exists, read existing records, append a new holiday object, and save the file If database file does not exist, write holiday object to a new file and save
      Parameters:
      holidayDate - Date of this holiday

    • getAllHolidays

      public ArrayList<Model.Holiday> getAllHolidays()
      Read every Cineplex in the database file and return them If database file is not found, ignore error and return an empty list
      Returns:
      Model.Holiday Return list of Holidays if found, else empty list

    • delete

      public void delete(LocalDate dateGiven)
      Delete a Holiday in the Database file corresponding to the date attribute passed in
      Parameters:
      dateGiven - Date of Holiday to delete

    • overwriteFile

      public void overwriteFile(String filename, ArrayList<Model.Holiday> data)
      Overwrite database file with new data list of holiday
      Parameters:
      filename - Filename to check for
      data - New ArrayList of Holiday to write to the file

    • isHoliday

      public boolean isHoliday(LocalDate dateGiven)
      Verify a date is a holiday by checking against every record in the database file
      Parameters:
      dateGiven - Date of Holiday to check
      Returns:
      boolean Return true if input date is a holiday, else false
